context: Will this work on a Samsung Galaxy Alpha phone?
response: It will work for any phone... use your old USB adapter as a power supply

context: I read that you can mount two of these side by side and change the knobs so that you will have a 6-lever quadrant. Has anyone done that?
response: Yes.It can be done in that way.When you need 2 throttle quadrants for multi-engine jet like Boeing or Airbus.You can easily assigned each lever for each engine.And the other two can be assigned as Speedbrake or flaps.

context: my computer doesnt have a disk drive, is there any way to play this?
response: Yes. You can copy the contents of the DVD to a USB drive on another computer. Then install it on your dvd-less computer. Verified to work.

context: Does this edition come with the Angel Wings for your character?
response: No, the angel wings come in the first CE. This one has no exclusive in game contents... Sad.

context: Does the system come with the jumper pack and any games?
does the new drive mess with the old memory
response: No, the drive just replaces the optical drive of the Wii. The internal memory is left untouched. It's pretty easy to swap out. Watch a youtube video on how to open your wii up first if you are unsure.
yes, can be used in disney infinity 1 & 2

context: Does the transmitter have to be plugged into USB for power? I wanted to hook up to my Samsung TV (I think the USB ports have limited output)
response: I'm not sure how much power it draws, but I do know that drivers may be an issue as these will not work with Linux without a fair bit of work.  So the TV may not transmit poperly.  if my TV has a USB input I may try it out and let you know.

context: High pitched buzzing noise as soon as the Vita begins to draw energy, am I the only one experiencing this?
response: I have not noticed this at all.  Maybe your unit is defective?

context: Can I fit my 3ds XL + Hori TPU hard case in the slot?
response: There is room in the hard pouch for the TPU but it may be a squeeze.

context: Can you play the game offline?
response: Yes, that is the only way you play it.

context: will this work with a Hp Pavillion Beats laptop windows 8?

context: Hi! I have a couple of questions...Is the black controller the original sony controller that came with your PS? Also are there any problems with the black controller?
response: Yeah the black one is the controller you get with the console. The controllers are all the same no matter what the color is.
